meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leigh Wishner Katie Proctor Joon Pahk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6223.

td.p: Leigh Wishner, an antique textile and costume specialist from the Bronx, New York
Katie Proctor, a stay-at-home mom from Hendersonville, North Carolina
Joon Pahk, a college physics teacher from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 7-day cash winnings total $199,000)

tr.td: BUCHANAN, JAMES BUCHANAN
SHAPES & SIZES
DISNEYLAND SONGS
(Alex: You have to identify the attraction each song is associated with.)
"GOOD" PEOPLE
WORLD OF WORDS
CHILDHOOD HEALTH
(Alex: Dr. Oz will do that.)

$8,801
Santa Fe')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
